name: Gone Fishing, and Feeding, and Fighting...
name_original: Gone Fishing, and Feeding, and Fighting...
description:
Made for the AGD "Arcade" themed Jam.

Note: Keybinds are: 1-6 for "buttons", and [Q, W, E, D, C, X, Z, A] in place of a Joystick. They aren't really "Buttons" in spirit of the Jam, and their use has been kept to ways I would have used joystick 8-directional movements.

I REALLY doubt a controller will work, so I suggest keyboard.

Tried to use the Mutator for "Genre that would not normally like the control scheme".
